meta.name: ai-build-orchestrator
meta.description: Defines how AI generates the website using all JSON definitions.

prompts.pageGeneration: Use the folder structure and page schema to generate page.tsx files with all sections and components. Use design tokens for colors, spacing, and typography. Apply UX interaction rules for animations, hover/focus states, and micro-interactions.
prompts.layoutGeneration: Generate layout.tsx files for each route group according to the layout template. Include Header, Footer, Sidebar, and nav slots. Pull design tokens and icons from the design system.
prompts.componentGeneration: Generate React components for all UI and section components defined in the registry. Components should use Tailwind classes derived from design tokens, respect icon library defaults, and implement UX interaction rules.
prompts.navigationGeneration: Generate navigation components based on the navigation schema. Include active, hover, and responsive states. Icons should be HugeIcons with default neutral gray color.
prompts.uxAndMotionIntegration: Apply all motion, transition, and micro-interaction rules from ux-interaction.json consistently across layouts, sections, and components. Respect reduced motion system preferences.
prompts.validation: After generation, validate that all pages use approved layouts, all components are from the registry, all icons are HugeIcons, and all folders/files match folder-structure.json.
